00069 /* forward function declarations */
00070 static void reaching_definition (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes,
00071                                  struct I_Reg *regs);
00072 static void ud_chain (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, struct I_Reg *regs,
00073                       Node entry);
00074 static void live_variable (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes,
00075                            struct I_Reg *regs);
00076 static void dominator (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, Node entry);
00077 static void post_dominator (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, Node entry);
00078 
00079 static struct I_Reg regs[MAX_REG_ID];
00080 static struct I_Node nodes[MAX_NODE_ID];
00081 static int nodes_defined = 0;
00082 
00083 #define GOOD_ID(id)             ((id>=0) && (id<MAX_NODE_ID))
00084 #define GOOD_REG_ID(id)         ((id>=0) && (id<MAX_REG_ID))
00085 
00086 static void
00087 punt (char *mesg)
00088 {
00089   fprintf (stderr, "error in dataflow analysis: %s\n", mesg);
00090   exit (-1);
00091 }
00092 
00093 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 static void
00095 reset_nodes (void)
00096 {
00097   register int i;
00098   if (nodes_defined != 0)
00099     {                           /* already defined */
00100       /*
00101        *      Garbage collection.
00102        */
00103       for (i = 0; i < MAX_NODE_ID; i++)
00104         {
00105           nodes[i].defined = 0;
00106           nodes[i].id = i;
00107           if (nodes[i].dest_reg != 0)
00108             {
00109               Set_dispose (nodes[i].dest_reg);
00110               nodes[i].dest_reg = 0;
00111             }
00112           if (nodes[i].src_reg != 0)
00113             {
00114               Set_dispose (nodes[i].src_reg);
00115               nodes[i].src_reg = 0;
00116             }
00117           if (nodes[i].gen != 0)
00118             {
00119               Set_dispose (nodes[i].gen);
00120               nodes[i].gen = 0;
00121             }
00122           if (nodes[i].kill != 0)
00123             {
00124               Set_dispose (nodes[i].kill);
00125               nodes[i].kill = 0;
00126             }
00127           if (nodes[i].use != 0)
00128             {
00129               Set_dispose (nodes[i].use);
00130               nodes[i].use = 0;
00131             }
00132           if (nodes[i].def != 0)
00133             {
00134               Set_dispose (nodes[i].def);
00135               nodes[i].def = 0;
00136             }
00137           if (nodes[i].e_in != 0)
00138             {
00139               Set_dispose (nodes[i].e_in);
00140               nodes[i].e_in = 0;
00141             }
00142           if (nodes[i].e_out != 0)
00143             {
00144               Set_dispose (nodes[i].e_out);
00145               nodes[i].e_out = 0;
00146             }
00147           if (nodes[i].a_in != 0)
00148             {
00149               Set_dispose (nodes[i].a_in);
00150               nodes[i].a_in = 0;
00151             }
00152           if (nodes[i].a_out != 0)
00153             {
00154               Set_dispose (nodes[i].a_out);
00155               nodes[i].a_out = 0;
00156             }
00157           if (nodes[i].v_in != 0)
00158             {
00159               Set_dispose (nodes[i].v_in);
00160               nodes[i].v_in = 0;
00161             }
00162           if (nodes[i].v_out != 0)
00163             {
00164               Set_dispose (nodes[i].v_out);
00165               nodes[i].v_out = 0;
00166             }
00167         }
00168       for (i = 0; i < MAX_REG_ID; i++)
00169         {
00170           regs[i].defined = 0;
00171           if (regs[i].e_def != 0)
00172             {
00173               Set_dispose (regs[i].e_def);
00174               regs[i].e_def = 0;
00175             }
00176           if (regs[i].e_use != 0)
00177             {
00178               Set_dispose (regs[i].e_use);
00179               regs[i].e_use = 0;
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }
00183   else
00184     {                           /* never defined */
00185       nodes_defined = 1;
00186       for (i = 0; i < MAX_NODE_ID; i++)
00187         {
00188           nodes[i].defined = 0;
00189           nodes[i].id = i;
00190           nodes[i].dest_reg = 0;
00191           nodes[i].src_reg = 0;
00192           nodes[i].gen = 0;
00193           nodes[i].kill = 0;
00194           nodes[i].use = 0;
00195           nodes[i].def = 0;
00196           nodes[i].e_in = 0;
00197           nodes[i].e_out = 0;
00198           nodes[i].a_in = 0;
00199           nodes[i].a_out = 0;
00200           nodes[i].v_in = 0;
00201           nodes[i].v_out = 0;
00202         }
00203       for (i = 0; i < MAX_REG_ID; i++)
00204         {
00205           regs[i].defined = 0;
00206           regs[i].e_def = 0;
00207           regs[i].e_use = 0;
00208         }
00209     }
00210 }
00211 
00212 struct I_Node *
00213 find_df_node (int id)
00214 {
00215   if (nodes_defined == 0)
00216     return 0;
00217   if (!GOOD_ID (id))
00218     punt ("find_df_node: illegal node id");
00219   if (nodes[id].defined == 0)
00220     return 0;
00221   return (nodes + id);
00222 }
00223 
00224 static struct I_Node *
00225 add_node (int id)
00226 {
00227   if (nodes_defined == 0)
00228     punt ("add_node: need to call define_df_graph() first");
00229   if (!GOOD_ID (id))
00230     punt ("add_node: illegal node id");
00231   if (nodes[id].defined == 0)
00232     {
00233       nodes[id].defined = 1;
00234     }
00235   return (nodes + id);
00236 }
00237 
00238 struct I_Reg *
00239 find_df_reg (int reg_id)
00240 {
00241   if (nodes_defined == 0)
00242     return 0;
00243   if (!GOOD_REG_ID (reg_id))
00244     punt ("find_df_reg: illegal register id");
00245   if (regs[reg_id].defined == 0)
00246     return 0;
00247   return (regs + reg_id);
00248 }
00249 
00250 static struct I_Reg *
00251 add_reg (int reg_id)
00252 {
00253   if (nodes_defined == 0)
00254     punt ("add_reg: need to call define_df_graph() first");
00255   if (!GOOD_REG_ID (reg_id))
00256     punt ("add_reg: illegal register id");
00257   if (regs[reg_id].defined == 0)
00258     {
00259       regs[reg_id].defined = 1;
00260     }
00261   return (regs + reg_id);
00262 }
00263 
00264 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00265 static FGraph graph = 0;
00266 static struct I_Node *node = 0;
00267 static Node entry = 0;
00268 
00269 void
00270 define_df_graph (void)
00271 {
00272   /*
00273    *  Start from an empty structure.
00274    */
00275   if (graph != 0)
00276     {
00277       FreeGraph (&graph);
00278       graph = 0;
00279     }
00280   reset_nodes ();
00281   node = 0;
00282   entry = 0;
00283   /*
00284    *  Build a new graph.
00285    */
00286   graph = NewGraph ();
00287   if (graph == 0)
00288     punt ("define_df_graph: failed to create a graph");
00289 }
00290 
00291 /*
00292  *      The first call add_df_node after define_df_graph
00293  *      defines the entry node.
00294  */
00295 void
00296 add_df_node (int id)
00297 {
00298   Node n;
00299   if (graph == 0)
00300     punt ("add_df_node: need to call define_df_graph() first");
00301   if (!GOOD_ID (id))
00302     punt ("add_df_node: bad node id");
00303   n = FindNode (graph, id);
00304   if (n == 0)
00305     {
00306       n = NewNode ();
00307       nodeId (n) = id;
00308       AddNode (graph, n);
00309     }
00310   node = find_df_node (id);
00311   if (node != 0)
00312     {
00313       punt ("add_df_node: cannot add a node twice");
00314     }
00315   node = add_node (id);
00316   nodeExt (n) = (void *) node;
00317   if (entry == 0)
00318     entry = n;
00319 }
00320 
00321 void
00322 add_df_node_src_reg (int reg_id)
00323 {
00324   struct I_Reg *r;
00325   if (graph == 0)
00326     punt ("add_df_node_src_reg: need to call define_df_graph() first");
00327   if (node == 0)
00328     punt ("add_df_node_src_reg: need to call add_df_node() first");
00329   if (!GOOD_REG_ID (reg_id))
00330     punt ("add_df_node_src_reg: bad register id");
00331   r = add_reg (reg_id);
00332   node->src_reg = Set_add (node->src_reg, reg_id);
00333   r->e_use = Set_add (r->e_use, node->id);
00334 }
00335 
00336 void
00337 add_df_node_dest_reg (int reg_id)
00338 {
00339   struct I_Reg *r;
00340   if (graph == 0)
00341     punt ("add_df_node_dest_reg: need to call define_df_graph() first");
00342   if (node == 0)
00343     punt ("add_df_node_dest_reg: need to call add_df_node() first");
00344   if (!GOOD_REG_ID (reg_id))
00345     punt ("add_df_node_dest_reg: bad register id");
00346   r = add_reg (reg_id);
00347   node->dest_reg = Set_add (node->dest_reg, reg_id);
00348   r->e_def = Set_add (r->e_def, node->id);
00349 }
00350 
00351 /*
00352  *      For nodes which have not been defined,
00353  *      this function will leave the extension field as 0.
00354  */
00355 void
00356 connect_df_node (int src_id, int dest_id)
00357 {
00358   Node n1, n2;
00359   if (graph == 0)
00360     punt ("connect_df_node: need to call define_df_graph() first");
00361   n1 = FindNode (graph, src_id);
00362   if (n1 == 0)
00363     {
00364       n1 = NewNode ();
00365       nodeId (n1) = src_id;
00366       AddNode (graph, n1);
00367     }
00368   n2 = FindNode (graph, dest_id);
00369   if (n2 == 0)
00370     {
00371       n2 = NewNode ();
00372       nodeId (n2) = dest_id;
00373       AddNode (graph, n2);
00374     }
00375   ConnectNodes (n1, n2, 0);
00376 }
00377 
00378 void
00379 end_df_graph (void)
00380 {
00381   Node n;
00382   struct I_Node *p;
00383   if (graph == 0)
00384     punt ("end_df_graph: need to call define_df_graph() first");
00385   if (entry == 0)
00386     punt ("end_of_graph: empty function");
00387   for (n = graph->nodes; n != 0; n = nextNode (n))
00388     {
00389       p = (struct I_Node *) nodeExt (n);
00390       if (p == 0)
00391         punt ("incomplete definition: missing some nodes");
00392     }
00393 }
00394 
00395 /*===========================================================================*/
00396 void
00397 analyze_df_graph (int mode)
00398 {
00399   /*
00400    *  1. compute the reaching definition.
00401    */
00402   if (mode & REACH_DEFINE)
00403     reaching_definition (graph, nodes, regs);
00404   /*
00405    *  2. compute the ud-chain.
00406    */
00407   if (mode & USE_DEF_CHAIN)
00408     ud_chain (graph, nodes, regs, entry);
00409   /*
00410    *  3. live-variable analysis.
00411    */
00412   if (mode & LIVE_VAR)
00413     live_variable (graph, nodes, regs);
00414   /*
00415    *  4. dominator analysis.
00416    */
00417   if (mode & DOMINATOR)
00418     dominator (graph, nodes, entry);
00419   if (mode & POST_DOMINATOR)
00420     post_dominator (graph, nodes, entry);
00421 }
00422 
00423 /*===========================================================================*/
00424 static void
00425 reaching_definition (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, struct I_Reg *regs)
00426 {
00427   register int i, reg_id, change;
00428   Node node;
00429   /*
00430    *  1. compute the gen[] and kill[] sets.
00431    *          gen[S] = id(S)
00432    *          kill[S] = reg[dest(S)].e_def - {id(S)}
00433    */
00434   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00435     {
00436       Set gen, kill, def, temp;
00437       i = nodeId (node);
00438       gen = Set_add (0, i);
00439       kill = 0;             /* kill = all nodes that modify the output of i */
00440       def = 0;
00441       for (reg_id = 0; reg_id < MAX_REG_ID; reg_id++)
00442         {
00443           if (regs[reg_id].defined == 0)
00444             continue;
00445           if (!Set_in (nodes[i].dest_reg, reg_id))
00446             continue;
00447           temp = def;
00448           def = Set_union (def, regs[reg_id].e_def);
00449           Set_dispose (temp);
00450         }
00451       kill = Set_subtract (def, gen);
00452       Set_dispose (def);
00453       nodes[i].gen = gen;
00454       nodes[i].kill = kill;
00455     }
00456   /*
00457    *  2. compute e_in[] and e_out[] sets.
00458    */
00459   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00460     {
00461       i = nodeId (node);        /* e_out[] = gen[] */
00462       nodes[i].e_out = Set_union (nodes[i].gen, 0);
00463     }
00464   change = 1;
00465   while (change)
00466     {
00467       change = 0;
00468       for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00469         {
00470           Set in, out, temp;
00471           Arc arc;
00472           i = nodeId (node);
00473           /*
00474            *  in[] = union(out[] of all predecessors of i)
00475            */
00476           in = 0;
00477           for (arc = sourceArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00478             {
00479               Node source = sourceNode (arc);
00480               int src_id = nodeId (source);
00481               temp = in;
00482               in = Set_union (in, nodes[src_id].e_out);
00483               Set_dispose (temp);
00484             }
00485           /*
00486            *  out[] = gen[] + (in[] - kill[])
00487            */
00488           temp = Set_subtract (in, nodes[i].kill);
00489           out = Set_union (nodes[i].gen, temp);
00490           Set_dispose (temp);
00491           /*
00492            *  see if there is change.
00493            */
00494           temp = Set_subtract (nodes[i].e_out, out);
00495           if (Set_size (temp) != 0)
00496             {
00497               change += 1;
00498             }
00499           else
00500             {
00501               Set_dispose (temp);
00502               temp = Set_subtract (out, nodes[i].e_out);
00503               if (Set_size (temp) != 0)
00504                 {
00505                   change += 1;
00506                 }
00507             }
00508           Set_dispose (temp);
00509           /*
00510            *  update.
00511            */
00512           temp = nodes[i].e_in;
00513           nodes[i].e_in = in;
00514           Set_dispose (temp);
00515           temp = nodes[i].e_out;
00516           nodes[i].e_out = out;
00517           Set_dispose (temp);
00518         }
00519     }
00520 }
00521 
00522 /*===========================================================================*/
00523 static void
00524 ud_chain (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, struct I_Reg *regs, Node entry)
00525 {
00526   register int i, change;
00527   Node node;
00528   Set U;
00529   struct I_Node *ptr;
00530   /*
00531    *  1. compute the gen[] and kill[] sets.
00532    *          gen[S] = id(S)
00533    *          kill[S] = reg[dest(S)].e_def - {id(S)}
00534    *  Here, we assume that the two sets have been computed.
00535    */
00536   /*
00537    *  2. compute a_in[] and a_out[] sets.
00538    *          in[entry] = 0
00539    *          out[entry] = gen[entry]
00540    *          for (S<>entry) 
00541    *                  out[S] = U - kill[S]
00542    */
00543   U = 0;
00544   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00545     {
00546       i = nodeId (node);
00547       U = Set_add (U, i);
00548     }
00549   ptr = (struct I_Node *) nodeExt (entry);
00550   ptr->a_in = 0;
00551   ptr->a_out = Set_union (ptr->gen, 0);
00552   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00553     {
00554       if (node == entry)
00555         continue;
00556       i = nodeId (node);
00557       nodes[i].a_in = 0;
00558       nodes[i].a_out = Set_subtract (U, nodes[i].kill);
00559     }
00560   /*
00561    *  Loop until a stable solution is available.
00562    */
00563   change = 1;
00564   while (change)
00565     {
00566       change = 0;
00567       for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00568         {
00569           Set in, out, temp;
00570           Arc arc;
00571           if (node == entry)    /* forget about the entry node */
00572             continue;
00573           i = nodeId (node);
00574           /*
00575            *  in[] = intersect(out[] of all predecessors of i)
00576            */
00577           in = Set_union (U, 0);
00578           for (arc = sourceArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00579             {
00580               Node source = sourceNode (arc);
00581               int src_id = nodeId (source);
00582               temp = in;
00583               in = Set_intersect (in, nodes[src_id].a_out);
00584               Set_dispose (temp);
00585             }
00586           /*
00587            *  out[] = gen[] + (in[] - kill[])
00588            */
00589           temp = Set_subtract (in, nodes[i].kill);
00590           out = Set_union (nodes[i].gen, temp);
00591           Set_dispose (temp);
00592           /*
00593            *  see if there is change.
00594            */
00595           temp = Set_subtract (nodes[i].a_out, out);
00596           if (Set_size (temp) != 0)
00597             {
00598               change += 1;
00599             }
00600           else
00601             {
00602               Set_dispose (temp);
00603               temp = Set_subtract (out, nodes[i].a_out);
00604               if (Set_size (temp) != 0)
00605                 {
00606                   change += 1;
00607                 }
00608             }
00609           Set_dispose (temp);
00610           /*
00611            *  update.
00612            */
00613           temp = nodes[i].a_in;
00614           nodes[i].a_in = in;
00615           Set_dispose (temp);
00616           temp = nodes[i].a_out;
00617           nodes[i].a_out = out;
00618           Set_dispose (temp);
00619         }
00620     }
00621   Set_dispose (U);
00622 }
00623 
00624 /*===========================================================================*/
00625 static void
00626 live_variable (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, struct I_Reg *regs)
00627 {
00628   register int i, n, change;
00629   Node node;
00630   /*
00631    *  1. for each node,
00632    *          use[S] = all source registers.
00633    *          def[S] = all destination registers.
00634    *          in[S] = 0;
00635    *          out[S] = 0;
00636    */
00637   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00638     {
00639       i = nodeId (node);
00640       nodes[i].use = Set_union (nodes[i].src_reg, 0);
00641       nodes[i].def = Set_union (nodes[i].dest_reg, 0);
00642       nodes[i].v_in = 0;
00643       nodes[i].v_out = 0;
00644     }
00645   /*
00646    *  2. iterate until a stable solution is available.
00647    */
00648   n = 0;
00649   change = 1;
00650   while (change)
00651     {
00652       change = 0;
00653 #ifdef TEST
00654       n++;
00655       printf ("iteration[%d]\n", n);
00656 #endif
00657       for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00658         {
00659           Set in, out, temp;
00660           Arc arc;
00661           i = nodeId (node);
00662 #ifdef TEST
00663           printf ("node[%d] = \n", i);
00664 #endif
00665           /*
00666            *  out[S] = union(in[] of all successors of S)
00667            */
00668           out = 0;
00669           for (arc = destinationArcs (node); arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00670             {
00671               Node dest = destinationNode (arc);
00672               int dest_id = nodeId (dest);
00673               temp = out;
00674               out = Set_union (out, nodes[dest_id].v_in);
00675               Set_dispose (temp);
00676             }
00677           /*
00678            *  in[S] = use[S] + (out[S] - def[S])
00679            */
00680           temp = Set_subtract (out, nodes[i].def);
00681           in = Set_union (nodes[i].use, temp);
00682           Set_dispose (temp);
00683           /*
00684            *  see if there is change.
00685            */
00686           temp = Set_subtract (nodes[i].v_in, in);
00687           if (Set_size (temp) != 0)
00688             {
00689               change += 1;
00690             }
00691           else
00692             {
00693               Set_dispose (temp);
00694               temp = Set_subtract (in, nodes[i].v_in);
00695               if (Set_size (temp) != 0)
00696                 {
00697                   change += 1;
00698                 }
00699             }
00700           Set_dispose (temp);
00701           /*
00702            *  update.
00703            */
00704 #ifdef TEST
00705           PrintSet (stdout, "use", nodes[i].use);
00706           PrintSet (stdout, "def", nodes[i].def);
00707           PrintSet (stdout, "old_in", nodes[i].v_in);
00708           PrintSet (stdout, "old_out", nodes[i].v_out);
00709           PrintSet (stdout, "new_in", in);
00710           PrintSet (stdout, "new_out", out);
00711           printf ("change = %d\n", change);
00712 #endif
00713           temp = nodes[i].v_in;
00714           nodes[i].v_in = in;
00715           Set_dispose (temp);
00716           temp = nodes[i].v_out;
00717           nodes[i].v_out = out;
00718           Set_dispose (temp);
00719         }
00720     }
00721 }
00722 
00723 /*===========================================================================*/
00724 static void
00725 dominator (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, Node entry)
00726 {
00727   int id, source_id, change;
00728   Set all, old_dom, temp, inter;
00729   Node node, source;
00730   Arc arc;
00731   /*
00732    *  Initialization
00733    */
00734   all = 0;
00735   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00736     {
00737       id = nodeId (node);
00738       if (nodes[id].dom != 0)
00739         nodes[id].dom = Set_dispose (nodes[id].dom);
00740       all = Set_add (all, id);
00741     }
00742   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00743     {
00744       id = nodeId (node);
00745       if (node == entry)
00746         nodes[id].dom = Set_add (0, nodeId (entry));
00747       nodes[id].dom = Set_union (0, all);
00748     }
00749   /*
00750    *  Compute dominance relationship
00751    */
00752   change = 1;
00753   while (change > 0)
00754     {
00755       change = 0;
00756       for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00757         {
00758           id = nodeId (node);
00759           old_dom = nodes[id].dom;
00760           arc = sourceArcs (node);
00761           if (arc == 0)
00762             {
00763               temp = 0;
00764             }
00765           else
00766             {
00767               source = sourceNode (arc);
00768               source_id = nodeId (source);
00769               temp = Set_union (nodes[source_id].dom, 0);
00770               arc = nextArc (arc);
00771               for (; arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00772                 {
00773                   source = sourceNode (arc);
00774                   source_id = nodeId (source);
00775                   inter = Set_intersect (temp, nodes[source_id].dom);
00776                   temp = Set_dispose (temp);
00777                   temp = inter;
00778                 }
00779             }
00780           temp = Set_add (temp, id);
00781           if (!Set_same (temp, old_dom))
00782             change += 1;
00783           nodes[id].dom = Set_dispose (nodes[id].dom);
00784           nodes[id].dom = temp;
00785         }
00786     }
00787   all = Set_dispose (all);
00788 }
00789 /*===========================================================================*/
00790 static void
00791 post_dominator (FGraph graph, struct I_Node *nodes, Node entry)
00792 {
00793   int id, dest_id, change;
00794   Set all, old_post_dom, temp, inter;
00795   Node node, dest;
00796   Arc arc;
00797   /*
00798    *  Initialization
00799    */
00800   all = 0;
00801   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00802     {
00803       id = nodeId (node);
00804       if (nodes[id].post_dom != 0)
00805         nodes[id].post_dom = Set_dispose (nodes[id].post_dom);
00806       all = Set_add (all, id);
00807     }
00808   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00809     {
00810       id = nodeId (node);
00811       if (destinationArcs (node) == 0)
00812         {
00813           nodes[id].post_dom = Set_add (0, id);
00814         }
00815       else
00816         {
00817           nodes[id].post_dom = Set_union (0, all);
00818         }
00819     }
00820   /*
00821    *  Compute post_dominance relationship
00822    */
00823   change = 1;
00824   while (change > 0)
00825     {
00826       change = 0;
00827       for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00828         {
00829           id = nodeId (node);
00830           old_post_dom = nodes[id].post_dom;
00831           arc = destinationArcs (node);
00832           if (arc == 0)
00833             {
00834               temp = 0;
00835             }
00836           else
00837             {
00838               dest = destinationNode (arc);
00839               dest_id = nodeId (dest);
00840               temp = Set_union (nodes[dest_id].post_dom, 0);
00841               arc = nextArc (arc);
00842               for (; arc != 0; arc = nextArc (arc))
00843                 {
00844                   dest = destinationNode (arc);
00845                   dest_id = nodeId (dest);
00846                   inter = Set_intersect (temp, nodes[dest_id].post_dom);
00847                   temp = Set_dispose (temp);
00848                   temp = inter;
00849                 }
00850             }
00851           temp = Set_add (temp, id);
00852           if (!Set_same (temp, old_post_dom))
00853             change += 1;
00854           nodes[id].post_dom = Set_dispose (nodes[id].post_dom);
00855           nodes[id].post_dom = temp;
00856         }
00857     }
00858   all = Set_dispose (all);
00859 }
00860 /*===========================================================================*/
00861 #define MAX ((MAX_NODE_ID > MAX_REG_ID) ? MAX_NODE_ID : MAX_REG_ID)
00862 
00863 static void
00864 print_set (FILE * F, Set set, char *prefix)
00865 {
00866   int i;
00867   fprintf (F, "{");
00868   for (i = 0; i < MAX; i++)
00869     {
00870       if (Set_in (set, i))
00871         {
00872           if (prefix != 0)
00873             fprintf (F, "%s", prefix);
00874           fprintf (F, "%d,", i);
00875         }
00876     }
00877   fprintf (F, "}\n");
00878 }
00879 
00880 void
00881 print_df_node (FILE * F, struct I_Node *node)
00882 {
00883   fprintf (F, "### NODE [%d] .%d\n", node->id, node->defined);
00884   fprintf (F, "# src_reg = ");
00885   print_set (F, node->src_reg, "r");
00886   fprintf (F, "# dest_reg = ");
00887   print_set (F, node->dest_reg, "r");
00888   fprintf (F, "# gen = ");
00889   print_set (F, node->gen, "");
00890   fprintf (F, "# kill = ");
00891   print_set (F, node->kill, "");
00892   fprintf (F, "# use = ");
00893   print_set (F, node->use, "r");
00894   fprintf (F, "# def = ");
00895   print_set (F, node->def, "r");
00896   fprintf (F, "# e_in = ");
00897   print_set (F, node->e_in, "");
00898   fprintf (F, "# e_out = ");
00899   print_set (F, node->e_out, "");
00900   fprintf (F, "# a_in = ");
00901   print_set (F, node->a_in, "");
00902   fprintf (F, "# a_out = ");
00903   print_set (F, node->a_out, "");
00904   fprintf (F, "# v_in = ");
00905   print_set (F, node->v_in, "r");
00906   fprintf (F, "# v_out = ");
00907   print_set (F, node->v_out, "r");
00908   fprintf (F, "# dom = ");
00909   print_set (F, node->dom, "");
00910   fprintf (F, "# post_dom = ");
00911   print_set (F, node->post_dom, "");
00912 
00913   fprintf (F, "###\n");
00914 }
00915 void
00916 print_df_graph (FILE * F)
00917 {
00918   int id;
00919   Node node;
00920   for (node = graph->nodes; node != 0; node = nextNode (node))
00921     {
00922       id = nodeId (node);
00923       print_df_node (F, &nodes[id]);
00924     }
00925 }
